attributes.action: Fast UK visa for Turkish people who were affected by the earthquake
attributes.additional_details: Our Turkish relatives who are living in Turkey, in the earthquake zone can't live in their houses right now and we as their families would like to host them here in our houses for a while. Opening consulates in Turkey and fastening the visa procedures Government will help many earthquake victims.
attributes.background: After the earthquake in Turkey we as Turkish community would like to invite our families to UK with visiting family visas, but since consulates in Turkey are now closed the visa procedures are stopped. We would like the government to create fast visa solutions for Turkish people in this bad time

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a Turkish Family Scheme visa for people homeless due to the earthquake: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632772

Create emergency visa schemes for victims of earthquakes in Turkey and Syria: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632816
